desc: Welcome to my boutique! I make beautiful antique style jewelry, hair accessories, compact mirrors, bracelet helpers, business card cases, bookmarks and more. Each is meticulously handmade with beautiful components including filigrees, pearls, charms, crystals, cameos and more.

layout.text:
~Hand Crafted Jewelry and Beautiful Gifts~
Original, vintage-inspired designs meticulously hand crafted
by Michelle Sims aka Topaz.
